H = VL_HISTMARG(H, DIMS) marginalizes the historgram H w.r.t the dimensions DIMS. This is done by summing out all dimensions not listed in DIMS and deleting them.

Remark

If DIMS lists only one dimension, the returned histogram H is a column vector. Notice that this way of deleting dimensions is not always consistent with the SQUEEZE function.

See also: VL_HELP().
